name: Qwilfish
author: Kenkichi Toyama
flavor_text: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.

poke_power.name: Balloon Sting
poke_power.effect: Once during your opponent’s turn, if Qwilfish is your Active Pokémon and is damage by an attack (even if Qwilfish is Knocked Out), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Nerve Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
